content:
Thanks for confirming your provider. I wasn't able to find a specific guide for your mail provider without creating an account.

You should look for settings similar to the ones below.

  • Download and delete messages from the server immediately after retrieval
  • Download messages but leave a copy on the server
  • Download, leave on server for a defined number of days, then delete
  • Download only new/unread messages and leave already-downloaded messages untouched.
